description: Details of instalment features on the account.

instalmentsLimit.description: Maximum combined limit of all instalment plans that may be created on the account. If `null` or not present, an opened account balance _creditLimit_ may be assumed to provide a maximum limit for instalments.

maximumConcurrentPlans.description: Maximum number of concurrent active instalment plans that may be created on the account. If `null`, there is no predetermined maximum number.

maximumPlanValue.description: Maximum value that can be opened as an instalment plan. If `null` or not present, _instalmentsLimit_ is assumed to be the maximum individual plan value.

maximumSplit.description: Maximum number of instalment payments a plan can be created with.

minimumPlanValue.description: Minimum value that can be opened as an instalment plan.

minimumSplit.description: Minimum number of instalment payments a plan can be created with.
